notes.short:
A service that allows to control a rectangular matrix of monochrome LEDs.
To stream the state of the screen, use [LED Matrix display](/services/led-matrix-display) instead.

packets.name: status_code
packets.description:
Reports the current state or error status of the device. ``code`` is a standardized value from 
the JACDAC status/error codes. ``vendor_code`` is any vendor specific error code describing the device
state. This report is typically not queried, when a device has an error, it will typically
add this report in frame along with the announce packet.

packets.name: status_code_changed
packets.description: Notifies that the status code of the service changed.

packets.name: leds
packets.description:
Read or writes the state of the screen where pixel on/off state is 
stored as a bit, column by column. The column should be byte aligned.

packets.name: brightness
packets.description: Sets the general brightness of the LEDs. ``0`` turns off the screen.

packets.name: rows
packets.description: Number of rows on the screen

packets.name: columns
packets.description: Number of columns on the screen

packets.name: clear
packets.description: Shorthand command to clear all the LEDs on the screen.
